detail_desc: High-waisted trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Wide, tailored trousers in a softly draping silk blend with a high waist and an extended waistband with buttons and hook-and-eye fasteners. Zip fly, fake welt back pockets and wide legs with creases. Unlined.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Microfibre leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cropped vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Long-sleeved shirt in washed cotton denim with a print motif front and back. Corduroy-lined collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a press-stud.
T-shirt in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, raw edges around the sleeves and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with glittery and contrasting colour sections. Lightly padded shaft and tongue, elasticated lacing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in lightweight denim with side and back pockets and a frill-trimmed waist with elastication at the back and sewn-on bow at the front.
A-line dress in glittery tulle with flutter sleeves, a round neckline and small opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in airy wool jersey containing some cashmere with extra-long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a linen and cotton weave with ties at the back. Lined. The cotton content of the sun hat is organic.
Baby Exclusive. Shirt in an organic cotton weave with buttons and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Short slits in the sides.
Top in a soft, fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, slim-fit, pull-on jeans in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Small, glittery shoulder bag in braided plastic straw and imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap. One inner compartment and a flap with a snap lock. Lined.
Calf-length dress in sturdy denim with wide shoulder straps, buttons down the front and a slit at the back. Detachable, adjustable belt at the waist. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless, circular dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a decorative bow at the front and gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined at the top.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Tulle top with tiered frills front and back, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short frilled sleeves. Unlined.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a deep neckline front and back and short sleeves.

Short dress in cotton poplin with a square neckline and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication, a gathered seam under the bust, smocking at the back and a gently flared skirt with pockets in the side seams. Concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Shorts in a soft linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short slits in the sides.

Short, single-breasted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Straight cut with a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with a wide lace trim, low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring at the waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop with a rubber print at the back. Mesh insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Puff-sleeved T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
3/4-length trousers in jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front and wide, straight legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Short, straight-cut shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Long dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Long sleeves, narrow buttoned cuffs with a pleated frill trim, and a pleated skirt. Partly lined.
Running top in fast-drying, jacquard-patterned functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a kangaroo pocket. Press-stud on one shoulder, press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, V-neck jersey dress with a wrapover top and seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and frayed hems.

Waist bag in sturdy, textured imitation leather with a zip at the top, an outer compartment with a flap and press-stud and two card slots at the front. Adjustable metal chain that fastens around the waist. Unlined. Width 29 cm.
Slub-knit jumper in a soft, fluffy yarn with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Wrapover blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and ties at the side. 3/4-length, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Fitted top in textured jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and long puff sleeves.
Jersey vest top with a print motif, braided trim around the front of the neckline and a wide, asymmetric hem with an overlocked edge.
Straight-cut mesh top with short sleeves.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. The jeans are made from thermal Thermolite® fabric.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Cotton twill trousers with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and tie belt. Fake fly, discreet side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Loose-fitting trousers in soft fleece with covered elastication at the waist and hems.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a wrapover V-neck, seam at the waist with pleats at the front and a tie belt, and buttoned cuffs.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft knit.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Wide blouse in a cotton and silk weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with cuffs, and short slits in the sides.

Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with buttons at the top and short cap sleeves. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Embroidery in a contrasting colour around the neckline and sleeves.
Boxy-style hooded top in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports armband with a touchscreen window for smartphones, adjustable hook and loop fastening and earphone outlet at the top and bottom. Fits smartphones up to 7x14 cm in size.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Fitted dress in a soft, fine knit with a slight sheen. Sewn-in wrapover at the top and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Short fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front panel with a knot detail at the hem.
Striped bow tie in satin with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elastic hem. Extra firm support.

Sturdy shoulder bag in rattan with imitation leather details. Handle, adjustable shoulder strap, a flap with a snap lock fastening, and studs on the base. Satin lining made from recycled polyester. Depth 10 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 15 cm.
